page.title: 04PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: Two popular playground games are marbles and Polo. Marbles is played by two people trying to hit small glass or metal balls called marbles by rolling them along the playground.When you hit your opponents marble you win one of his marbles.There are many kinds of glass marbles.A Bare Lady is a clear glass marble and a Steely is a metal ball.A Spec is black with lots of coloured spots on.Other names are Gobbies,Flobbers,Bullseye,Oily, Devil and China. In the game Polo one person is on and he or she chooses a group name such as Shoes,Cars,Trees or Houses Each person playing thinks of a member of that group.If the group is shoes and the person on picks sandals,anyone who thought of sandals races him or her round the playground. The one who is back first and shouts Polo is on. RACHEL,VANESSA,MIRANDA, aged 10
